text: īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷē! Nīṅkaḷ allāhvukku añci, avaṉuṭaiya (iṟutit) tūtar mītum īmāṉ koḷḷuṅkaḷ; avaṉtaṉ kirupaiyiliruntu iru maṭaṅkai uṅkaḷukku vaḻaṅki, ōr oḷiyaiyum uṅkaḷukku aruḷvāṉ, ataik koṇṭu nīṅkaḷ (nērvaḻi) naṭappīrkaḷ, iṉṉum, uṅkaḷukkāka (uṅkaḷ kuṟṟaṅkaḷaiyum) avaṉ maṉṉippāṉ - allāh mikavum maṉṉippavaṉ, mikka kirupai uṭaiyavaṉ
